Description.0: The Edda class is the massive escort ship to the even more massive yggdrasil class.
Description.1: These ships are designed to protect and augment the yggdrasil class helping to expand the roles of these massive ships.
Description.2: only one was ever put into service indipendant from the yggdrasil class, that being the Edda herself.
Description.3: The Edda is used to defend the yggdrasil when they're in dock.
